entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
